That's when you get the goose bumps, Allen Iverson said.`` You honestly don't really feel it when the shots are going down. You don't ever get the goose bumps until the fans start to appreciate what you're doing out there.''

In North America he's creating consensus on Chrysler before its initial public offering, while in Italy he needs to shock the country into creating a more competitive environment.
